messages.subject: Coming to the US - Orange County/Seal beach CA
messages.msgSnippet: Hi everyone, So this is actually my first post though i have been an active reader for many years. :) The reason i am finally posting is my family is coming to
messages.messageBody:
Hi everyone,
So this is actually my first post though i have been an active reader for many years. :)

The reason i am finally posting is my family is coming to the US in 2 weeks! Our dates in CA will be 23/Oct - 4/Nov. We will be staying in Seal beach (Orange county area) and i would love some ideas from people!
My daughter is almost 7 and my son is 3.5yrs. Would anyone like to recommend some fun/cool stuff to do in the area in general? Places to check out?

We'd also especially be interested in any Halloween related stuff, we are staying with grandparents and will be doing our first trick o treat thing but we'd love to hear if there is other fun stuff around?

We'd also be interested in any unschooling meets in the area during that time, would love to catch up for play.

This is off topic so if you have any recommendations for us just drop me an email offlist on lisabogle@...

Thanks everyone - Happy Halloween :)
Warmly,
Lisa
